TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode is an enumeration that specifies the security modes supported by the MSMQ integration channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This enumeration can be set within a configuration file in the [\<security\>](../Topic/%3Csecurity%3E%20of%20%3CmsmqIntegrationBinding%3E.md) section. It can also be set in code by passing the appropriate value into the constructor of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode Transport = int32(1)
